data.title: DuBose Porter Center at Oconee Fall Line Technical College
data.meta_description: Located just off I-16, the Dubose Porter Center makes hosting your next event easy with a variety of venue spaces available!
data.text:
The DuBose Conference Center at Oconee Fall Line Technical College (OFTC) has 17,000 square feet of meeting and event space within 22 unique rooms. The center’s amenities include audio-visual equipment, beautifully spacious lobby, state-of-the-art lighting, wireless networking, and discount packages for weddings and large meetings.

DuBose Porter Center offers the ultimate in event customization. The Conference Center exhibit hall seats 800 banquet style and 1500 theater-style. Friendly, professional conference center teams are available to help plan and book your perfect event!

We Are Here to Help Year-Round

Whether you are planning a conference, meeting, weddings, theme parties, community events, workshops, or other educational events, DuBose Porter Center is here to help coordinate all of your needs. For groups big and small (and medium), you’ll receive personalized attention to you smallest details. With a blend of modern amenities and a professional ambiance, this conference space will be the perfect backdrop for meaningful collaborations and impactful presentations, ensuring your event is not just held, but truly experienced.

Located just off I-16, the Dubose Porter Center makes hosting your next event easy! Features include a large ballroom, dance floor, top-notch catering kitchen, and small rooms for your bridal party or private entertaining. DuBose Porter Center space and footprint makes a convenient and unique location for your next event.

Features & Services

Full-Service Conference Center

17,000 square foot ballroom

120 tier-seating lecture hall

12-person Executive Boardroom

General-purpose rooms

Computer Labs

State-of-the-art audio/visual equipment, lightening, and wireless networking

Large stage and dance floor

Catering services

Security and/or parking attendants

Main Lobby, Training Rooms A-H, YKK Lecture Hall, Classrooms, and Computer Labs

Click here for directions, floor plans, and additional features for this venues.

Rental Guidelines

For complete rental information, visit Booking Events at OFTC

The Extra Mile
